mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Matthews, Samuel to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Matthews, Samuel
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov of Virginia Wheeling Aug 19 1862. By Telegraph from Point Pleasant 19 1862. there are thirty (30) recruits in Jackson Co and will be fifty (50) Is the eleventh (11th) regt entitled to all recruits raised there. Lieut Matthews 23D68pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Matthews, Samuel
Point Pleasant, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
